name: After The Calamity We Will Regain
description:
Channeling a thoughts in the early of pandemic and maybe it could relate on
certain circumstances up until now).
We're living in a dire time to live and love. 
But I believe that we can get through all of these. 
I believe good time will happen and I wish we're all in a good health 
to look after yourself and our beloved ones. 
Wish y'all stay safe and sound
_
4724x5096 px
_
If you collect or purchase a token of this work you have the right to:
- Posting or publishing the work that you collect through your social media accounts, including the credit of the creator's name/ account and the link to his social media account or the link that is linked to the creator.
- Print this artwork in physical print format for personal display purposes (not intended to commercialize this asset)
- Presenting this work at a digital exhibition event on a specific platform that accommodates it, while still giving credit to the creator.
- The rest is the right to enjoy it and I am happy if you are willing to write your point of view from my work and you publish and share stories for this work.

Warm Regards
Alfi Patria
